name: Midland Beach Skatepark
description: Beachside skatepark with ocean breezes and a solid mix of street and transition elements.
history: Community-funded park that opened after years of petitioning by local skaters.
bestTimes: Late afternoon — catch the sunset while you session.
transitDirections: S51 bus to Midland Ave, walk toward the beach.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include mini ramp, rails, hubba, pyramid. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Staten Island skate scene in Midland Beach. Community-funded park that opened after years of petitioning by local skaters.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: S51 bus to Midland Ave, walk toward the beach.. Late afternoon — catch the sunset while you session.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark — standard park etiquette applies.
